posts.post_content:
I posted this card with a few T205 and T206 I was selling in the tobacco card forum and thought I'd put it up here as well.  I am not a 19th century collector but I believe the card I have is 471-1 (bat at the ready).  It is graded SGC AUTH and is skinned.  I had $125 on it originally, but will sell it for $100 plus postage if anyone is interested.  I can send photos to anyone interested.

Email me [url]rnovak14@wi.rr.com[/url] to see the card.
Price is now $100 plus $3 for shipping

Can you please send me a scan:

[url]cowlesf@aol.com[/url]

Thanks
